attributes.action: out law agencies that use umbrella type payment schemes
attributes.additional_details: All construction agencies try to pay via an umbrella company,hence if the worker works 60 hrs at 10pounds an hour,in the cold light of day the worker recieves 20-30percent in reduction of what they should be paid,hence lining the coffers of 3rd party umbrella companie
attributes.background: People who work for recruitment agencies get they're pay made by a 3rd party with somewhat large reductions for doing so.hence taking a large slice out of the workers net wages

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition asking for the use of umbrella payment schemes to be banned, if that's what you would like to happen.
